pilots.name: DGS-047
pilots.caption: Adaptive Intelligence

shipAbility.name: Networked Aim
shipAbility.text: You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.

pilots.ability: After you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], you may acquire a lock on it. Then, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], it gains 1 strain token.

pilots.name: Baktoid Drone

shipAbility.name: Networked Aim
shipAbility.text: You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.

pilots.text: A late-war development for the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the droid gunship uses specialized repulsors to nimbly strafe targets and precisely drop battle droids.

pilots.name: Geonosian Prototype
pilots.caption: Devastation Protocols

shipAbility.name: Networked Aim
shipAbility.text: You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.

pilots.ability: While you perform a [Missile] or [Cannon] attack, you may remove 1 tractor token from the defender to reroll up to 2 attack dice.

pilots.name: DGS-286
pilots.caption: Ambush Protocols

shipAbility.name: Networked Aim
shipAbility.text: You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.

pilots.ability: Before you engage, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0-1. That ship transfers 1 calculate token to you.

pilots.name: Onderon Oppressor
pilots.caption: Atmospheric Attack Module

shipAbility.name: Networked Aim
shipAbility.text: You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.

pilots.ability: After you barrel roll or sideslip, if you are stressed, gain 1 calculate token.

pilots.name: Separatist Predator
pilots.text: Armed with ordnance and protected by ray shields, a droid gunship can devastate Republic infantry formations and starfighters with equal proficiency.

shipAbility.name: Networked Aim
shipAbility.text: You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.
